author: Ramrod
title: Flying to Leh , where to stay the first 2 nights ?
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Jammu & Kashmir » Flying to Leh , where to stay the first 2 nights ? Flying to Leh , where to stay the first 2 nights ? # 1 Hello, Im flying in August from Delhi to Leh , to avoid problems with the high altitude i think its best to stay the first 2 nights at Alchi or Uleytokpo? or are there better options /other places ? Can you recommend any place to sleep (max 2500-3000rp per night) Thank you
